name: Toy Tanks (Luscsus)
description:
Click on the tanks to rewind them. This game was made during the 2020 Brackeys game jam. The theme for the jam was Rewind. Unfortunately I lost interest. And I didn't complete it. But I decided to still upload it. Overall my first game jam was fun.

CREDITS:

Font:  Pixel Font - Tripfive.

Main soundtrack: Patrikus Droilius:

Sound effects: freesound.org.

Everything else: Me.
